entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:17 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
